Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
The Guangzhou Football Academy, hosted at BSG's Nanhu campus, begins term two's programme this weekend.
Classes will be held on Saturdays and Sundays for children from 4 to 15 years old. For details, CLICK HERE.
Please contact the Academy through enquiry@hkf-academy.com to enrol or request further information.
Kind regards,
